title: Set Image Memory cards to a fixed 2:3 aspect ratio

requirements.summary: Change Image Memory cards (front and back) from 4:3 to a fixed 2:3 aspect ratio while preserving flip alignment and editing/upload interactions.
acceptanceCriteria: Each ImageMemoryCard displays at a 2:3 aspect ratio on the front side (image/placeholder) and the back side (message).
The 3D flip interaction still aligns correctly (front/back faces overlap and match dimensions).
Image upload, Replace/Add button placement, and Adjust/Save framing interactions still work and remain usable at the new aspect ratio.
No changes are made to the Video Memory section (it should remain 2:3 as already implemented).

file_operations.description: Update the Image Memory card layout to render in a fixed 2:3 (width:height) aspect ratio instead of 4:3, ensuring both the front (image/placeholder) and back (message) faces share identical dimensions during the 3D flip. Adjust the placement of the aspect-ratio constraint so the flip container defines sizing and the faces fill it, preserving button positioning (Replace/Add, Adjust/Save) and drag-to-frame interactions.

Refine the shared 3D card CSS utilities (e.g., card-face sizing/positioning) so front/back faces reliably overlap and fill the same 2:3 container during the flip animation (no offset, no mismatched height), without affecting the Video Memory tile styling.
